CustomField.formula: If(Aging_Days__c > 20 && (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'FA Review') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, '2nd FA')), IMAGE('/resource/1535629670000/red','red',25,50), If(Aging_Days__c > 10 && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'FV Review') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'FV/FA Queue'), IMAGE('/resource/1547096280000/orange','orange',25,50),IMAGE('/resource/1535629399000/green','green',25,50)))
CustomField.label: Aging
